UMCS.Games.Lib
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--UMCS.Games.Lib.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
TimerAlarm
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbTTPlayer, AlphaBetaPlayer, MiniMaxPlayer, NegAbPlayer, NegaMaxPlayer, NzsAbfPlayer, NzsAbPlayer, NzsPlayer, OmBs1pPlayer, OmPlainPlayer, PromPlainNabPlayer, PromPureNabPlayer
public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements TimerAlarm

Player

This base class is the start of every game playing class.
It provides a number of tools that are useful in any game-playing algorithm, such as a timer, transposition tables, log files, and evaluation counters.

Version:
JUNE 2000
Author:
H.H.L.M. Donkers
